title: Marlon Neon Marksman MC
description: As the president of Neon Marksman MC, Marlon always takes the lead with fierce determination. From the moment he met Unique he knew she was meant for him, but a moment from the past has driven a wedge between them. When Unique is confronted with something unsettling, she instinctively turns to the one person who has the resources to help. A second chance is all Marlon needs to fully claim his Old Lady as his. A chance he grabs with both hands. They challenge each other at every turn, but when push comes to shove, will they move forward or stay stuck in the past? Will Unique submit to her feelings or will she be hunted down by a killer out for revenge?
author: Esther E. Schmidt
